body: Hey guys it's penguin today I wanted to say well um wait this is on Wednesday but I will discuss this today anyway so to bad so sad and you really mad um yeah! (this guy makes no sense) Well anyway on Wednesday I am going on vacation. But where to friken licken chicken ricken biken sicken hicken "deep breath" Virginia.  You guys are probably (not) sad that I'm going but if your like he won't play if you said that or your brother, sister, mom , dad or even your fat aunt! sorry didn't mean that ,but your wrong. I will play because my aunt has Wi-Fi so I will be able to play so YAY! Are you with me eye eye captain oooooooooooh! who lives in a pineapple under the sea my mom does. Sorry hopefully no offence is taken. So if your like that'll be fun your wrong all I have is girl cousins. I only have a grown up cousin who has a girl friend, a cousin who is in a mental hospital don't ask friken why, and a baby just a little baby cousin so for me life sucks. Except for my sister (aka the annoying girl who likes Justin beaver and 1 direction) Really what kind of name is 1 direction that will get you in the middle of no where! But I would really appreciate it if you left me a comment don't have to but just a suggestion.(I lied do it now!) See you later everyone! Ps: join the penguin army!

title: Vacation.

replies.body:
Um... ok.
Goodbye :) We'll miss you, though you mentioned you'll be playing still?
